definition: love of beauty/wishing to appear beautiful/to set store by one's appearance
to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]

pinyin: ai4 mei3 zhi1 xin1 , ren2 jie1 you3 zhi1

sentences.chinese: 愛美麗一直在尋求孤獨。

sentences.english: The sage said, The heart of loving beauty exists everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 古人也雲，愛美之心，人皆有之。

sentences.english: To the sky blue sky revelation I love the nature I Amy good city.
sentences.chinese: 向天空的藍天啓示我愛大自然我愛美好的城市。

sentences.english: It's human nature to love beauty.
Saint-Emilion is the oldest wine area of the Bordeaux region.
sentences.chinese: 聖愛美濃是波爾多地區最古老的酒區。

sentences.english: To be frank, do you love beauty?
Lewd , the heart person of the love of beauty all has it.
sentences.chinese: 好色慕艾，愛美之心人皆有之。

sentences.english: They may love sunshine and food, 0r they hold ideas and dreams.
sentences.chinese: 他們或者愛陽光愛美食，或者有創意有夢想。

sentences.english: However, for the beauty of expression that people are different and very different.
sentences.chinese: 可是人們對於愛美的表達方式卻千差萬別，大相徑庭。

sentences.english: And more than beauty he loved Ruth.
sentences.chinese: 而他愛露絲又甚於愛美。

sentences.english: To love beauty is to see the light.
The rise of "secondhand" famous brandname clothes shops has provided natty dressers with a channel for exchange.
sentences.chinese: 名牌服飾店的興起，使得愛美人士有了衣物交流管道。

sentences.english: Heart of beauty in everyone, not to mention it is in adolescence.
sentences.chinese: 愛美之心人皆有之，更何況是正處在青春期呢。

sentences.english: She starred in films like "Gentleman Prefer Blondes" in nineteen fifty-three.
sentences.chinese: 她主演電影中，像“紳士愛美人”在1963五十。

sentences.english: Aimei bumps into Youqing on her shopping trip.
sentences.chinese: 愛美去買爬山運動服，遇到有情。

sentences.english: Redhawk I do love america in fact I joined the Marines at 17.
sentences.chinese: 我很愛美國，事實上我17歲就加入了海軍陸戰隊。

definition: to feel strongly about/to be fond of/obsession/deep commitment
to go out/to leave home/to go on a journey/away from home/(of a woman) to get married
to take good care of (or conserve) one's health/to keep in good repair/to maintain/maintenance
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
to believe (sth in relation to oneself)/to regard oneself as/to acknowledge (sth in relation to oneself)/to resign oneself to
to belong or be dedicated exclusively to/proprietary/private/personal
